event.title: TRADEVERSE
event.description:
IET NITK Venture proudly presents its first event of the year - **Tradeverse**

Tradeverse is an event where participants not only learn about stock markets and trading but are able to apply that knowledge in a virtual trading event following the KEP. Jumpstart your stock trading and investment journey as beginners in the stock market with the added bonus of winning **cash prizes**.


Registration Link

[http://bit.ly/TRADEVERSE_Registration](http://bit.ly/TRADEVERSE_Registration)

KEP Link

[https://youtu.be/jN_s4oz5MQY](https://youtu.be/jN_s4oz5MQY)


#### Schedule

Friday, 30th July 2021

Knowledge Exchange Program on The Basics of Stock Market - 4:30 PM.

Saturday, 31st July 2021

Day 1 of the Virtual Trading Event - 9 AM to 8 PM.

Sunday, 1st August 2021

Day 2 of the Virtual Trading Event - 9 AM to 8 PM.
